S.FORM: John Block sraral hya'ga sisyuw na NBA, wal malaxmisuq qaniy la. kawas tay 1944, ryax sa tay 16 nqu tay 4, John Block, squliq na p'unro. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' Lists of National Basketball Association players

John Block sraral hya'ga sisyow na NBA, wal malaxmisoq qaniy la. kawas tay 1944, ryax sa tay 16 nqo tay 4, John Block, sqoliq na p'onro. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' Lists of National Basketball Association players
